trans-unit.source: Creates a transformation specified by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>, used to manipulate objects or coordinate systems in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] world space.

Use the MatrixTransform3D class to create custom transformations that are not provided by the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.RotateTransform3D>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D>, or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.TranslateTransform3D> class.
You can combine <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> objects by using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3DGroup> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>.
A Matrix3D that specifies the transform.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref>, and makes deep copies of this object's values.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy animations or their current values.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects or of any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D"></xref> object, and makes deep copies of this object's current values.
Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects or of any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether the transform is affine.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the transform is affine; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> that specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] transformation.
## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
A Matrix3D that specifies a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transformation.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets a matrix representation of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] transformation.
The Value property inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> class.
The Value property enables you to convert any <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Transform3D> object into a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D> object.

Because the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform> class is defined by using a Matrix3D, the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D.Matrix%2A> and Value properties always return the same value.
The MatrixTransform3D class exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Media.MatrixTransform.Matrix%2A> property to enable write access.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> representation of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transformation.
